name: Postgresql
description:
PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system (ORDBMS) with an emphasis on extensibility and standards compliance.  
This app creates a PostgreSQL master slave set.
#### License:
* PostgreSQL License
#### Hardware Requirement:
* By default, three VMs each with 2 vCPU and 4GB RAM
#### Resources Installed:
* Postgresql 9.5
#### Operating System:
* CentOS Linux release 7.4.1708
* Select the [AWS AMI](https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/fulfillment?productId=b7ee8a69-ee97-4a49-9e68-afaee216db2e&ref_=dtl_psb_continue) according to the region.
#### Platform:
* AHV
* AWS
#### Lifecycle:
* Backup
* Restore
#### Limitations:
* Upgrade lifecycle management is not available.
* For evaluation purposes only. Not recommended for production use.
#### Other Instructions:
* Make sure port `5432` is open on AWS Security Group and Firewall. 
#### Accessibility:
* `sudo su - postgres sh -c psql `
author: Nutanix
